attributes.action: grant government funding to a worthwhile course for the unemployed people in Sefton.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The Sefton Routeway programme is a programme that enables the unemployed people of sefton, to learn valuable experiences in different sectors, enabling them with a new qualification, and work experience placement, giving them better opportunities at finding work. Working with the local council, NHS, Fire Brigade and other local employers for the placements. The course also gives people the confidence of rediscovering their abilities and confidence, including social interraction.
